sys_ui_message.key: Show the applied filter element(s) together with the Indicator name. If a filter cannot apply to a visualisation, the element(s) do not show. Toggle off to hide the filter element(s) applied.
sys_ui_message.message: Show the applied filter element(s) together with the Indicator name. If a filter cannot apply to a visualisation, the element(s) do not show. Toggle off to hide the filter element(s) applied.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: Show the applied filter element(s) together with the Indicator name. If a filter cannot apply to a visualisation, the element(s) do not show. Toggle off to hide the filter element(s) applied.
